title: Transfer
body: Hello, I have a question regarding the transfer disable, anyone has an idea how long it is  for?

replies.body: I don't currently see any issues with transfers.  Are you receiving any errors, like being on a ranked team?  Anymore details can help.  Let me know!
I can't find where to buy a transfer. Please advise as for dummies, 'cuz i've looked for a way to transfer all day...
